Class Main

java.lang.Object
microsim.Main
public class Main extends Object
Contains program entry point. Handles program arguments and EPROM loading, instantiates simulation instances and attaches interfaces.

  • Method Details

    • getArgument

      private static String getArgument(String[] args, String tag)
      Gets argument parameter following argument tag. With tag = "-t", from '-t "arg"' returns "arg". If no argument is found, returns null.
      Parameters:
      args - program's argument string Array
      tag - the argument tag to search for (such as "-d")
      Returns:
      the argument parameter as a string

    • hasArgument

      private static boolean hasArgument(String[] args, String tag)
      Gets if argument tag is present (used for Boolean arguments). With tag = "-t", from '-t' returns true. If no argument is found, returns false.
      Parameters:
      args - program's argument string Array
      tag - the argument tag to search for (such as "-d")
      Returns:
      a Boolean that represents if the tag was found

    • getSimulationData

      private static byte[] getSimulationData(String[] args)
      Gets program arguments, initializes flags and loads EPROM data.
      Parameters:
      args - program arguments
      Returns:
      EPROM data array

    • initInterfaces

      private static void initInterfaces(Simulation simulation)
      Initializes interfaces and attaches them to simulation
      Parameters:
      simulation - simulation instance to attach to

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Program entry point. The program flow is:
      1. Get data needed for simulation instantiation. This includes arguments, and the object file containing EPROM data and the debug argument.
      2. Instantiate a Simulation object with said data.
      3. Attach interfaces to simulation. These include VideoWindow and DebugShell.
      4. Begin executing simulation.
      Return values are:
      1. Normal termination.
      2. User error.
      3. Simulation error.
      Parameters:
      args - program arguments
